note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Wesabe.com is no more
Wesabe, the personal finance manager, shut down in July of 2010. We kept the discussion forums up for a couple more years, since they were relatively low maintenance, but they eventually started attracting more spam than not, so we decided it to close that down as well.

### The code lives on
Most of the [the code behind Wesabe](https://github.com/wesabe) is now in the public domain, on GitHub.

Thanks!

The Wesabe Team
name: Wesabe
